title: Verattaama Veraturiye Lyrics Veera
stanzas: <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">Verattaama Veratturiye Song Lyrics Veera

Verattaama Veratturiye nee
thorathaama thorathuriye
theruvellaam thirinjene naan
unai thaedi tholanjenadi

merattaama meratturiye ne
kadathaama kadathuriye
verappathaan alanjaalum
un nenappathaan alanjenadi

nee venum nana vazha
nee venum kan mooda
varuvene uyirai tharuvene
enakellaam adiye
ini neethaane (2)

adangaa yaekkam
enai thaakkum podhu
adi nenjil idi minnal aache

thodangaa kadhal
thodanga mugavariya
thandhene en thookkam poche

endhan viral neengi
engaeyum pogaadhe
neeyum paarvaiyaale
mella erikkiraaye

nee venum nana vazha
nee venum kan mooda
varuvene uyirai tharuvene
enakellaam adiye
ini neethaane
neethaaney

Verattaama Veratturiye nee
thorathaama thorathuriye
theruvellaam thirinjene naan
unai thaedi tholanjenadaa

merattaama meratturiye ne
kadathaama kadathuriye
verappathaan alanjaalum
un nenappathaan alanjenadaa

nee venum nana vazha
nee venum kan mooda
varuvene uyirai tharuvene
enakellaam adiye
ini neethaane (2)
